amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by 9,826,370 and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by 9,826,370 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 257 (Roll no. 315).
